website_summaries.verdict: This is a comfortable pair of rain boots that will keep feet reliably dry and warm all while resisting dirt and stains.
pros: Comes in  both vibrant and neutral color options to suit every style
Very comfortable shoes that are enjoyable to wear
These stay leak-free even after extended wear
Lightweight design and very resistant to dirt and water marks
cons: Tend to run smaller in the calves area, so might be tight on those with large legs

customer_reviews.title: Let it Rain!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute rain boots!! Rain boots that make you want it to rain! Great color! Super comfortable. These aren't the most flexible rain boots. I normally wear a size 7 to 7 1/2 shoe. I ordered a size 8 and the fit is great. I can also wear them with thick socks comfortably. I normally wear a 7 in Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for muddy event
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with my purchase- I needed these boots for an outside event I went to and rain was in the forecast. It was super muddy/wet and these boots kept my feet dry! I read the reviews about them being smaller than expected and I bought them because of that. It’s hard for me to find boots that fit my legs- these were perfect! They were not too tight and did what I needed them to do. They were also great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: zjdhzjdjzj

customer_reviews.title: Ten points for griffin For!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I ordered these for myself as a guy but bought the size 11 as it’d fit a men’s 9. I received the bow string and they look like anybody’s boots. I love how light they are and they slip on and off pretty easily. The crocs material is well known and very sturdy. If your a guy wanting croc boots you’ll like these. I am going to email the company and ask them to do a men’s line because why not? They’re good and near,y indestructible.. I still have my originals and in years have not broken the black tabs off the sides. Remember when they broke easily..
customer_reviews.author: mkruge

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots ... replaced my Extra Tuffs ... no seams, no leaks so far ,,, like that I can feel the ground ... Could use a bit more flexibility in the ankle but that may adjust over time ... ... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for work and I will never order crocs online again. They were too small and not what I expected. When I returned them I was charged a restocking fee and also charged because the tags were off. Well guess what, the tags weren’t on them when they arrived and I didn’t know I was gonna be charged for trying these on. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, and they do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal Crocs wearer, and I love these boots! I wear a 7 in other Crocs shoes (and other brands) and that's what I needed with these. I wore these to my daughter's field trip. It was muddy and we went through a creek as well. A very dirty creek, but they came out just fine and didn't stain at all. Very impressed. The fit is comfortable, as well. Other moms were complaining of blisters from their boots, but I didn't have that problem. They were also cute, probably too cute to wade through a creek, but they were fun and I got compliments on them. Would definitely recommend. I bought the flame colored ones.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Stiff :(
customer_reviews.text: I thought they might become less stiff with use, but no. Walking, and particularly trying to take the stairs with them on, is super awkward not being able to bend your foot without slipping the boots half off. This was my first experience with crocs material-- it's like a hard plastic. They're at least water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and keep my feet dry
customer_reviews.text: I effing love these boots. I spend most of my days hiking and during the winter it is a muddy mess. These boots keep my feet warm and dry and I can stomp through all manner of horrors along the trail no problem. Everyone I run into asks me about them. And the color is so fun! I have skinny calves so these are perfect. Most rain boots are so wide, rain just falls into them which makes them useless. Sturdy too, I’ve been wearing them nearly every day for a couple of months and they’re only getting more comfortable. It did take a few days to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Casey N.

customer_reviews.title: ostrich caretaker approval
customer_reviews.text: I took these boots with me to Ecuador, where I hiked in a swamp (paramo), the jungle (tiputini) and the Galapagos islands. They were SO comfy and light. I also used them that fall when I worked as an ostrich keeper. I mixed and poured cement in them too and it washed off real quick. They're waterproof, comfortable, and have a spring to the sole that i love. I don't like pointy boots or heavy boots so i really hit the jackpot with these. I honestly love them. They make a little crease when you start wearing them but otherwise that's it.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBanana316

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy & light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: So, I wear a 9.5 in 90% of brands. I don't own anything in a 10, but do have a handful of size 9's. So when this (brown color) wasn't available in a 10, I got a 9.... And am super bummed because they are just a bit too small to wear comfortably. They're so cute though! The calf opening fits perfectly, the bows are really cute and they are overall very comfortable & durable. And sooooo lightweight. Really wish I could return them and get a bigger size. But theyre amazing rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: April Rae

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get dirty + Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I got compliments on the color. It looks like an original yellow rain-boot. Very light weight and difficult to get dirty! On the bottom of the foot barley gets dirty, I think it is from the material. Sometimes it makes my feet cold. The fit was perfect and i fit a 7 women.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RIP-OFF!
customer_reviews.text: Virtual Exchanges is a complete rip-off. Purchased a pair of these Crocs Freesail rain boots. Returned them due to not fitting properly around the calf. The return amount was deducted by over 60% just for trying them on because they consider that “ worn once “. Who doesn’t try something on when they purchase? Will definitely never purchase from Virtual Exchanges again and strongly urge anyone else does the same!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and look fine, my feet don’t hurt from wearing them. They seem to be functional but after a couple of months I’ve noticed that they are really stiff to walk in. They’re also a little difficult to drive in because the plastic-y material doesn’t have much give. They’re getting visible creases at the top of the foot where you bend your ankles to walk. Overall, okay value for the money because they’re relatively inexpensive, but I would recommend a more traditional rubbery rain boot with a little more give.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Latex free rain boot great for those allergic to rubber
customer_reviews.text: For my outdoor rainy day adventures, these boots are great. I added shoe inserts which made them a tad tighter but they mold to my feet. I wear a size 7 shoe and ordered a size 7 here. If I wanted a bit more wiggle room, the next size up would have worked too. The best thing about these boots is that they are latex free and I am allergic to latex. I have no reactions in these rain boots and stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my Coraline costume for Halloween. I followed everyone's suggestion and ordered a size down. It was a perfect fit! They are comfortable and I had no issues with the calf fit, however, I am a petite person. They do get scuffed easily. I'm not sure how in one night they received scuffs all over.. but I'm sure I can wipe them off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jane P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE BOOTS!!! I work outdoors, needed something sturdy, comfortable, but cute, of course, these rain boots fit all 3 requirements. They do take some breaking in, like any shoes, but after that they're great, I got a lot of compliments. I would definitely recommend these, and buy them again, absolutely love the price, color, style, and comfort all while keeping my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Castro

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: The shaft of the boot is totally rigid, so bending your ankle if very difficult. It's a shame, because it is a super cute boot!
customer_reviews.author: GinGin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rainboots!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these rainboots! I’ve worn them this week and I have had zero issues with water getting in. My issue is that it is hard to walk up or down stairs in them as they do not bend like traditional rain boots do since it is made from croc’s material. Another issue is the sole is not comfortable. After a while walking, feet felt sore despite the comfort sole inside. Overall, it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deanakllee

customer_reviews.title: Not good for people with high instep
customer_reviews.text: I always admired crocs on others until I purchased these boots. Although they are for gardening they are uncomfortable. This material is not soft nor flexible and it hurts my instep. I am hoping it will give after using for a while. For the price I guess you get what you pay for. I will keep it but never again.
customer_reviews.author: John Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, light, and totally waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These are Crocs and since I've owned Crocs I had a good idea how these would fit and wear. I do a lot of hiking in the woods and certain times of the year the mud is miserable. I wore these on my last hike since we've had so much rain and they were very comfortable. I have really good hiking boots but wanted to wear something higher that I can walk through some major puddles in - and these were perfect. I have no complaints but for my own purposes I wish they were a little better suited for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the same time I bought a pair of black mules. Sadly the width and comfort I've experienced with other Crocs hasn't happened. They're ok - but I don't think that they'll hold up given the amount of walking I do outside. Noting the size differences in terms of width would really help!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little stiff but serve it’s purpose. I bought them for dog poop duty in the winter. They do the job, have great traction and with crocs you can expect them to last for ever. I also like that they have plenty of room in the calf.
customer_reviews.author: Mtjj1979

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a specific event I was working in the rain and they held up great. They fit well enough that I could actually drive in them, they fit with socks and my wider calf. They did not leak and my feet were actually pretty warm. And the price on these was fantastic. Very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonOh

customer_reviews.title: So much pain and heavy to wear
customer_reviews.text: These boots does block out water or rain but it is so stiff. Its hard to walk in! It is also a hazard to drive with bc it does not push the brake or gas pedals well. ZERO stars
customer_reviews.author: Symphonie

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Rubber Boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a black pair of rubber boots for a college, but of course it is hard to find cute black rubber boots. We found these and she loves them. They also do not hurt her feet like the other rubber boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer strawn

customer_reviews.title: Super thick, no give, hurts feet
customer_reviews.text: Please read the reviews before you purchace this product. All in all it seemed like a nice study shoe. However, once on and you try to walk the rubber is so thick that it doesn't really bend. Ye feet hurt so so bad after these. I did send them back in for a refund. The tie at the top is also just fir looks it doesnt tighten or loosen anything.
customer_reviews.author: Geramey

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.. pops again leg and makes sound,
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. The fit is great. The bow adds a cute detail. I do not like the 'popping' of the calf portion against my leg when I walk. The top of the boots, at the calf, are fairly wide in comparison to my other rain boots and they smack my leg when I walk and it makes a popping noise. I'm hoping a different material pan will help or maybe some wearing them with wear them in. Otherwise, they seem to be great.
customer_reviews.author: momof2girls

customer_reviews.title: STIFF Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are like trying to wear metal stovepipes, the plastic material does not bend or yield in any way. I was shocked and disappointed, as my last Croc rain boots (the knee high ones) were very comfortable, bendable plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Moving On

customer_reviews.title: Love these rainboots!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited whenever these boots were delivered to me. I have been looking for a good rain boot for years and these rain boots by Croc have ended my search. These boots fit perfectly, though it is a little awkward to walk in them at first. The awkwardness of walking in them goes away after you become accustomed to the boots. These boots fit perfectly and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Horton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I had a pair of Crocs rain boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I had a pair of Crocs rain boots that lasted much longer than more expensive rain boots and I wanted to replace them with another pair of Crocs. These are a different style than my previous pair but fit just as well and I'm hoping they last just as long. These are a cuter style and color.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rain and yardwork
customer_reviews.text: Have had these before and was happy to find on Amazon and they fit as expected. I ordered a size up from what I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: 3 M's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I got my true size and they fit great. I ordered these because the reviews mentioned they were tighter around the calves. I have pretty small calves and there is still a few extra inches, but they are better than most boots that I have tried. They don't leak and are perfect for what I needed them for....And cute too!
customer_reviews.author: ALLIE

customer_reviews.title: Loved the boots but they were to tight on my calves
customer_reviews.text: Loved the boots but they were to tight on my calves. My calves are not huge but obviously they are larger than what crocs thinks they should be. they are light weight and not to clunky. unfortunately i had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen DeCoste

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed; but size 6 should work
customer_reviews.text: Webpage advice was since these don't run in 1/2 size, then go down a size. I wear 5 1/2, so chose size 5. It was too small. I could get the boots on - tight fit; but had to get help to take them off!!! Very disappointed; but size 6 should work. Now I will find the process for exchange. . .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my trip, wore 3 days in a row!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, wore them 3 days in a row on vacation in March in Portland Oregon. I have a high instep and was worried that they would hurt but they did not at all. They are tall enough to offer great protection but not so high that they cut into the back of my knees while sitting!
customer_reviews.author: Traci M

customer_reviews.title: Noisy boot
customer_reviews.text: I like the rain boot, it keeps your feet dry but I don't like the sound it make when I walk. The upper part of the boot makes a LOUD FIP FLOP noise. Everyone can hear you coming!
customer_reviews.author: FY

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfy and cute rain boots
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy and cute rain boots. If you are a 1/2 size I recommend going to the size below as they run a little big. I am a 7 1/2 normally and the 7 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The boot was very narrow and I read the others reviews saying that it was nice and squishy and felt good I thought it needed more cushion on the heel it wasn’t that comfortable I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: Tad too small around the calves, somewhat flexible.
customer_reviews.text: What everyone is saying about the tops of the boots being too small for the calves are right. Although for me is wasnt a big deal. Theyre just a tad too small but doable. However if you have more muscular or just bigger calves in general, i'd recommend a different pair of boots. Theyre also not that flexable but are pretty lightweight and do seem to be of good quality. But i think if I wear them enough, theyll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good Muck Boots
customer_reviews.text: Kind of stiff but consider the source. Perfect for mucking about in the chicken coop or muddy garden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Fit perfectly, completely waterproof. The best thing is that I stand for hours a day, and these never hurt my feet. Super happy with this purchase! I get SO many compliments on this cool green color!
customer_reviews.author: Seahawks Dad

customer_reviews.title: It was more exciting seeing them on internet than in person
customer_reviews.text: Too wide just wide if you have large ankles Something you might like- but I have narrow & regular size thighs, it didn't flatter me
customer_reviews.author: Tang

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: tight around calf with absolutly no give. These are very stiff. i sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Spidergirl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: They were very cute. I wore these 4 times and every time they got wet they shrunk. I had to donate them because they no longer fit. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Guardian Angel Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Croc Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a 1/2 size above my size and the calf area and instep of this boot is still a bit tight. I would have liked some room in there but otherwise, they are completely lightweight and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Best rain boots
customer_reviews.text: So far good! Normally wear a Women’s size 81/2, this was a size 9, fits perfectly with a pair of socks! Calf not a problem with an inch to spare, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: brutus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed (lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed (lightweight, comfortable rain boots). I don't have large calves, I'm sure it's a matter of them either totally fitting you or totally not fitting you and you just have to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Rene U

customer_reviews.title: Wear long socks with these
customer_reviews.text: Wished they came in half sizes....liking them. Went to the Oregon coast for the weekend got these boots for walking on the beach
customer_reviews.author: gerri e

customer_reviews.title: Too Stiff & Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just wore my new boots on a walk with my dog. My feet stayed warm & dry, but the boots rubbed & dug into my shins & ankles whenever I took a step. They are just too stiff with no flexibility. And it is not a matter of breaking them in- they will most likely stay stiff & uncomfortable because of the thick sturdy plastic they are made of. I think I will return for a neoprene style boot that hopefully will have some give to the material.
customer_reviews.author: Amrta

customer_reviews.title: Perf
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!! So darn cute and fit with or without socks. Exactly what I wanted and clean off so nicely. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Staying Dry
customer_reviews.text: I like the boot, it keeps my feet dry. Although when I’m walking up and down the stairs it cuts into the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Orr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  but runs small
customer_reviews.text: It looks really beautiful but tight at the heel.All my rainboot have ever had is size 9 and i dont have a problem of taking them off.This is tight at the heel i struggle to take them off,maybe should have bought a size bigger .I wore them same day i recieved them cos my previous one was leaking and due to my kind of work but turns out that one of the legs was leaking
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: They fit bit you better wear socks or you need someone to help you take them off
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Really cute color. Comes up only an inch or ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute color. Comes up only an inch or two higher than mid calf. Strange height. Also, is stiff around the ankle, so when I walk they crease and push on my ankle. Hopefully will 'break in' and stop doing that. Cute and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: crice

customer_reviews.title: Kinda tight but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for all weather but they do run a bit small and no half size options. They take a long time to “break in” I’d give them 5 stars but they can be very difficult to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but a little tight in calves
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but they are a little tight in the calves, however I do have thick calves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits pretty well. Looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well. Looks nice too. Haven't rained since I got them. Weather forecast did predict rain for tomorrow. Can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: stiff
customer_reviews.text: they run a little big and they’re super stiff so going up and down stairs actually hurts
customer_reviews.author: nicole polsinelli

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a tight fit, but that was to be expected since I'm a size 4.5 but bought a 4 since they dont stock half sizes. Other than that, the quality was as expected. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit,  very comfortable. Very light weight!
customer_reviews.text: 9 1/2, would order a size 9. Great fit, very comfortable. Very light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable, waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought them to wear to Alaska for when I go on an Alaskan cruise in May. I tried them on and they fit great! The only problem that I see is that they are rather stiff at first, but I am sure that will subside with regular wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Woods

customer_reviews.title: 5 and the size 9 fits great. She says they are very comfortable and feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife, and she loves them. She's an 8.5 and the size 9 fits great. She says they are very comfortable and feel very soft inside despite not having a luxurious lining. Also seemed to be a good value and a brand with a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Eddystone

customer_reviews.title: Good gardening boit
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for me as a gift, thinking they were rain boots. They could be used for rainy days, but more appropriate for gardening or barn work!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Hard boot, better for very thin calves.
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight, I wear an 8 boot. But not flexible, my calves are not big, but these fit too snug over leggings. The string is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are VERY stiff unlike the Crocs Classic Clogs. When I tried them on and walked inside of my house, they were already hurting my ankles. I don't want to wear extra socks to protect my ankles every time I wear them, so I decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: C.Sky

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet so I didn’t think they were tight around my calfs at all. I own a pair of hunter boots and people always complement me when I were these instead. Super comfy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Barilari

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots - lightweight - easy to put on and take off - the bow adds stylishness. I wear shoe size 8 or 8.5. Bought the size 8 boots - fits perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I just bought these for my chicken pen because they’re only one piece they’re really easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Fits really awkward. The material isn’t flexible so it pinches your ankle when you bend down. I just bought these for my chicken pen because they’re only one piece they’re really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Gillette

customer_reviews.title: The water gets inside of the boots.
customer_reviews.text: Somehow the water gets inside of the boot, I realize that after wearing the boots my socks were wet and I checked inside the boot and it was wet.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca E.

customer_reviews.title: feels like walking in ski or snowboarding boots
customer_reviews.text: Light weight stiff plastic, feels like walking in ski or snowboarding boots. Hard to drive in.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Andrews

customer_reviews.title: but they're very comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Wear these everyday, and no one can tell they're crocs. They do make a clap sound against my calves, but they're very comfortable and waterproof, so I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: eMily Hollandful

customer_reviews.title: but the opening by the ankle is too small and my socks get pulled super tight making my toes uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: One my foot is in the boot it is not too small, but the opening by the ankle is too small and my socks get pulled super tight making my toes uncomfortable. I would recommend going up 1 size from what you wear. Rain boots are often worn when it is a little chilly in the fall or spring so you want room for warm socks since there is no soft inside lining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too big looking in general, very wide on my calves.
customer_reviews.author: JoMamma

customer_reviews.title: So Light
customer_reviews.text: Loved these rain boots! They are so light compared to others Ive had in the past, which REALLY helps with the clunkiness of wearing rain boots. They are so cute and the material is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Creasy

customer_reviews.title: Foot bed part of the boots fit was fine. Calf fit was too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Foot bed part of the boots fit was fine. Calf fit was too narrow, no way to tuck the pants inside the boots, and since the shaft is rigid material it made them uncomfortable in the calf when walking. Had to return them. Too bad, they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: nsw1970

customer_reviews.title: I wear them to work at animal sanctuaries and they are perfect! As others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6.5 and order 7 since half sizes are not available, but it still manages to fit alright. These boots are light as air! I wear them to work at animal sanctuaries and they are perfect! As others have mentioned, it's a bit stiff where your foot and leg meets to bend but it got better after I broke them in a bit. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Shiki

customer_reviews.title: great rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves her boots, comfortable and cute according to her. works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Harry Romero

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these I'm a ugg wear and I believe them were the best rain boots. To my surprise I adore these boots i will be ordering more thank you👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: B.I.G.20

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and material and durability; but they are difficult to get off!
customer_reviews.author: ANO

customer_reviews.title: Two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 6; however, I received a size 5 (right boot) and a size 6 (left boot). I tried the 6 on and it was very comfortable and cozy. So now I'm highly disappointed because I tried to re-order the boots but they are $40 more than what I paid. You all have to do better!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great, adorable boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were SO STINKING CUTE! I bought them for my 16yo neice and she loved them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darilyn

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one size small from my shoe size so had a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I absolute LOVE these boots!!!! I’ve bought so many other brands and could never find the right fit, until now! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: ACaban4

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Run small, go a size up. Very comfortable. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mealika Brown

customer_reviews.title: Holding Their Own!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to use for playing outside in the mud. They really held their own today in the Alabama "Snowpocalypse!" DW
customer_reviews.author: Dr. W

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are good boots that will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Elena S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this and she is very happy with it. She gets compliments everywhere she goes. It's very light weight and non-slip. The fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable, even for short periods of time
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Not the most comfortable, even for short periods of time, but it serves it's purpose as a rain book.
customer_reviews.author: Z Blaz

customer_reviews.title: Tight on calves
customer_reviews.text: I have wide calves and they fit very tight. Wish the specification explained in detail how these boots were.
customer_reviews.author: Mely

customer_reviews.title: Love these and the fit was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the fit was perfect ! Also they r tight at the calves which is good in my case no water gets in !
customer_reviews.author: kojak00

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and light
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way they look. I also love the fact that they are very light. I had Kamik rainboots a few years ago, but those were too stiff and heavy, I had to throw them away. As for the Crocs rainboots, I wish they were more flexible, but I guess this is how flexible rainboots can get. All in all, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots, Purchased to work in garden. Really cute. Want another pair for rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy times 2

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed, very stiff!
customer_reviews.text: TOO STIFF, you can barely walk. I literally could not walk up the stairs in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: After about an hour of wearing these, they will blister your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: I loved them
customer_reviews.text: They work great just if you wear them like me all day long look at some gel inserts they have padding just not enough to get you through a whole work shift
customer_reviews.author: MMiranda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these rain boots, a little stiff at first but they need to be worn in, really comfortable & warm, received alot of compliments on the different color :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these boots are very nice, but they hurt by the ankles
customer_reviews.text: these boots are very nice, but they hurt by the ankles..too much of a hassle to return, so i'm keeping them
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boot
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots.Easy to put on. I wear a 8.5-9 i got the 9 and love them. completely water resistant. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lynn Story

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are a bit tight around calf but theare nice and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurt your feet too much to wear
customer_reviews.text: They fit , but kill the tops of your feet when walking. Unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very light. I bought another pair online and gave it back after tried crocs.
customer_reviews.author: MC

product_meta.title: Crocs Freesail Rainboot
feature_bullets: Dual comfort foam footbed on top of a croslite foam midsole
Fit suggestion for 1/2 size recommended to size down
Slimmer, sleeker shape made with fully molded croslite
